credit_line: Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers
title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: linen, silk, metal-wrapped silk.  
Technique: embroidery.
description: Sampler of pattern bands worked in black, light green, yellow, orange, red, pink and white silk and gilt-wrapped silk core on natural linen.  Densely worked pattern bands in running, satin, chain, daisy and cross stitch with bargello work; hem stitched and picoted edge.
name: Sampler
